item.title: Commenting on others profiles
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

[quote=“Vain_, post:80, topic:539636”]then lets just get rid of messaging since we have irc, and everyone seems the believe it’s superior?
no.

just because we have something, doesn’t mean we can’t have alternatives.

we have irc, lets remove Skype/messenger settings from profiles?
we have 4 themes, let’s not add more.

just by having irc has the fallback to any other communication idea, won’t make the irc more active.
it’s used by only a select group of people, and those are the ones who’ve used it for years.

it’s not going to get popular in #help or anything as people don’t get help fast - this being due to the amount of idlers in the chat.

just because we have irc/messages, don’t mean we can’t have another means of communication.[/quote]If anybody asks for any legitimate help we (I, ^, t4 etc.) do try our best to help them (whether it be #moparscape or #help) but if people join and then flame you will get flamed right back. That aside the idling happens because there may be no significant discussion happening at the time, if you want help highlight people. That will get their attention.
That aside IRC isn’t used because “everyone seems to believe it’s superior” (that’s the reason 10yr olds use it, not the actual irc community) it’s used because of the ease-of-access it provides.
I do agree with you though, other means of communication are important and we should have more!
